alert.note: Alert for Niobrara County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 8:28PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Niobrara County through 915 PM MDT... At 827 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of Redbird, or 29 miles north of Lusk, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Redbird around 845 PM MDT. Mule Creek Junction around 900 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for east central Wyoming.
